cards.title: Concept & Scope
cards.content: We align on the **must-haves**. I listen, ask the hard questions, and craft a clear project roadmap *before* the first line of code.

cards.title: Design & Clarity
cards.content: I switch to **UI/UX (Figma)**. Every pixel is intentional—obsessed over alignment, spacing, and a clean, touch-friendly feel across all screen sizes.

cards.title: Rapid Prototype
cards.content: **Moving quickly, no cutting corners.** I deliver a clean, component-based front-end build and integrate the **BaaS (Firebase/Supabase)** for rapid functionality.

cards.title: Live Review & Refine
cards.content: **Instant follow-up!** I deploy the build to a free host like **Vercel** right away so you can test it live. We refine with precision based on your real-time feedback.

cards.title: Launch & Handover
cards.content: **Clean code, no guesswork.** We finalize the production build and I hand over everything—clear documentation, reusable components, and a smooth deployment process.
